content: **crochet drops poncho in snow and wrist warmers in vienna ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see wrist warmers pattern here 1 ------------------------- **poncho** **sizes** s/m - l/xl - xxl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 200-250-250 gr nr 06 olive drops 9 mm / us 13 double-pointed needles or size needed to obtain correct gauge drops 7 mm / us k crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 18 chain = approx 14 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/86-17-b---wristwarmers
